options.color-scheme-auto-explanation: Auto mode is based on browser or device setting.
options.change-does-overwrite-existing: Changes do not alter existing annotations.

onboarding.intro: Table of contents, notes and preferences are all in the menu.
onboarding.pagination: If you are distracted by scrolling, navigate by swiping left/right, tapping hidden buttons or pressing arrow keys.
onboarding.remember-heading: This book remembers, where you stopped reading

onboarding.annotations: When you select text, you can highlight it or add some comments.
onboarding.read-offline: (And read offline! The book is already stored in your browser.)

annotations.no-annotations-in-chapter: No highlights in this chapter. Add a highlight by selecting text.

annotations.confirm-destroy: Are you sure you want to delete this annotation?
